sense.name: play or dip in water
sense.examples: He dabbled his feet in water to cool down. After Lukas dabbled in the water we went and rode on some rides.

sense.name: be involved superficially
sense.commentary: Is: DABBLE IN Syntax Is: NP1[agent[animate]] DABBLE in NP2
sense.examples: She dabbled in amateur theatricals. He dabbled in Jewelry, he dabbled in stonework, and he dabbled in pottery. He dabbled in astronomy, in mathematics, and in psychology.

sense.name: swim, bob forward and under
sense.examples: Gradually the ducks, presumably a pair, dabbled their way to within range.
